cause.description:
Owned just doesn't do it. Pwned is juvenile and stupid. So owned? eh, getting old. Getting owned hardcore is basically like getting owned...but squared. Owned squared = squoaned!!! Squoaned is the future!
1. Squoaned is an excellent term of ownage.
2. Squoanage must continue on a daily basis.
3. Squoaned!
cause.name: Squoaned!!!
